info.title: MedsAPI Dynamic Health EBSCO Partners
info.description: MedsAPI Dynamic Health EBSCO Partner Endpoints. The documentation on this site covers all supported functionality of the MedsAPI suite of APIs. Any fields or parameters not represented by the documentation are unsupported and subject to change. Additional optional query parameters and fields in the response could be added in the future as a non breaking change. Any other change that could break the contract would be considered in a future version.

tags.description: MedsAPI Dynamic Health EBSCO Partner Exclusions Endpoints

tags.name: Article Notes

refresh_token_expires_in.description: The number of seconds remaining before the refresh token will expire.  The lifespan of refresh tokens is usually larger than Access tokens. The exact duration depends on the type of Refresh Tokens issued. The different types explained below in the document.

developer.email.description: Name of the owener of the token

token_type.description: Always set to be a bearer token

issued_at.description: Epoch time when the token was issued

client_id.description: Client Id that the token can be used by

application_name.description: Id of the application that is registered for this token

expires_in.description: Seconds until this token has expired

refresh_count.description: When this token can be refreshed automatically

status.description: Indicates that the token has been approved

401.description: Unauthorized - This request requires authentication and none was provided.

403.description: Forbidden - The authentication credentials do not have access to this resource.

404.description: Not Found - The server was unable to find a resource matching this request.

405.description: Method Not Allowed - The server has not implemented the requested HTTP method.

406.description: Not Acceptable - The server cannot return the requested media type.

415.description: Unsupported Media Type - The server cannot understand the media type in this request.

429.description: Too Many Requests - The client has sent too many requests within the given time.

500.description: Internal Server Error - There was an unexpected error with the server

client_id.description: The client_id to use will be provided by EBSCO

client_secret.description: This will be provided by EBSCO

post.description: The authentication endpoint for getting a token, used in all other Dynamic Health and Dynamic Health EBSCO Partner APIs.

get.summary: Get all article exclusions for a given customer
get.description: Get a list of all article exclusions for a given customer by providing that customer's id as a query parameter.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: ID of customer owning the article exclusion

rel.description: Relationship type of the href value

items.description: List of all article exclusions for a customer

id.description: Customer associated with this article exclusion

title.example: Implementing Psychiatric Advance Directives for Clients with Mental Health Disorders

timestamp.description: Date and time when last updated

get.summary: Get all custom articles for a given customer
get.description: Get a list of all custom articles for a given customer by providing that customer's id as a query parameter.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: ID of the customer owning the custom article

rel.description: Relationship type of the href value

items.description: List of all the custom articles owned by the customer

timestamp.description: UTC Date and time of last update

username.description: username of person making the update

href.description: Link to a particular custom article

get.summary: Get all article notes for a given customer
get.description: Get a list of all article notes for a given customer by providing that customer's id as a query parameter.

parameters.name: articleId
parameters.description: ID of the article that the note relates to

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: ID of the customer owning the article note

rel.description: Relationship type of the href value

items.description: List of all the sections for an article

id.description: Customer associated with this article note
Id of the article containing this note

text.example: This is our note for this article
text.description: Actual text of the article note

timestamp.description: Date when this note was added
